alert.note: Alert for Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Santa Fe Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 11:44AM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN SANTA FE COUNTY THROUGH 1230 PM MDT... At 1144 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stanley, or 16 miles north of Moriarty, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Galisteo and Stanley. This includes Highway 285 between Mile Markers 262 and 275. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building. Accumulations of small hail on roads can create very slick and hazardous driving conditions.

area.areaDesc: Central Highlands; Estancia Valley; Sandia, Manzano Mountains Including Edgewood; Santa Fe Metro Area
